Type: Adhesive Activators

3M Scotch-Weld Instant Adhesive Activator, AC113, clear, 4 L can

  • 3M Scotch-Weld General Purpose Instant Adhesive Accelerator AC113 is designed to accelerate the cure speed of instant adhesives to quickly produce strong, long-lasting bonds.

entry.title: 3M Fastbond FB-ACTIVATOR-1L - Spray Activator (1 Quart) 7000028593
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesive Activators
Price: 24.26

[shortdesc]

3M Fastbond Spray Activator, FB-ACTIVATOR-1L, 1 quart

  • 3M™ Fastbond™ Spray Activator 1 is a water-dispersed, high solids activator
  • It is to be used with the 3M™ Fastbond™ Adhesive 2000NF, 3M™ Fastbond™ Contact Adhesive 30NF and 3M™ Fastbond™ Foam Adhesive 100NF.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Fastbond
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Adhesive Activators
    Volume 1 Quart, 0.95 L

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Fastbond™ Spray Activator 1 is used to enhance the bonding capabilities and handling strength without forced drying equipment for most applications.

    • Product Information

  • Low VOC and LEED® compliant
  • UL MAGW2 component recognition
  • GREENGUARD® certified
  • Impact resistant

    • Suggested Application

  • Low temperature general purposes

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld CA-ACTIVATOR - Instant Adhesive Surface Activator ACT2 in light amber 2 Oz. (56.7 g) bottle 7000046525
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesive Activators
Price: 18.97

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Instant Adhesive Surface Activator, ACT2, light amber, 2 oz. (56.7 g) bottle

  • 3M™ Scotch-Weld™ Instant Adhesive Surface Activator is a one-part surface accelerator designed for use with instant adhesives
  • We engineered this adhesive accelerator to improve the cure speed of instant adhesives and help quickly produce long-lasting bonds and exceptional performance.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Light Amber
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Adhesive Activators
    Size 2 Oz, 56.7g

    Product Information

  • Accelerator designed to quicken cure speed of cyanoacrylate adhesives for fast results
  • One-part surface accelerator can be used for thick bond lines on porous substrates
  • Acetone-based for quick drying
  • Designed to quickly provide excellent bond strength

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal alternative for riveting or welding, bolt setting, frame building, rivet free assembly
  • Designed for bonding, joining, attaching, assembling and adhering
  • Designed for general industrial, sporting goods, solar energy, wind energy, Composites, electron
    		•
